name: Feed the Alien!
description:
Made for Mix and Game Jam November 2020

It's time to feed the alien!
Collect mushrooms and bring them to the alien chef. 
After you complete his recipe he will be very happy and give you another order.

Known Issue: In-editor, jump works just fine, but in builds of the game it sometimes doesn't work, just give it a second and it will be back. Sorry!
